body_html:
i'm trying to load a classifierdataset in this way

after train with addExample I save the model with this
localStorage.setItem('classifier', JSON.stringify(classifier.getClassifierDataset()));

and recover with
classifier.setClassifierDataset(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('classifier')));

knn-classifier:2 Uncaught (in promise) TypeError: r.clone is not a function
at knn-classifier:2

thanks

body:
i'm trying to load a classifierdataset in this way

after train with addExample I save the model with this
`localStorage.setItem('classifier', JSON.stringify(classifier.getClassifierDataset()));`

and recover with
`classifier.setClassifierDataset(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('classifier')));`

knn-classifier:2 Uncaught (in promise) TypeError: r.clone is not a function
    at knn-classifier:2

thanks
